channel.title: Drug on tehblog
channel.description: Recent content in Drug on tehblog

item.title: Dependency is Not Addiction
item.description: I’ll admit it; I am dependant on three drugs, but I am not an addict. The first of these is clear-cut, fluoxetine. I take it, good, I don’t, bad. Very bad. The second is Abilify. Same deal. The third is slightly more complex, Lyrica. When I take it I feel as I did years ago, but if I don’t then I get terrible nausea. A lot of people assume this is the same as addiction.
